page.title: 04CLIMATE AND SOILS
page.content: The area lends itself to agriculture.Crops vary according to factors such as soil-type,pH and aspect.The soil closest the river is very sandy if not graveley.The pH falls markedly over 500 feet.The climate is rather severe with an approximate temperature range of -20C to +28C air temperature over the past four years.The ground usually remains frozen at 1000 feet from mid-December to early March,with snow lying on at least 30 days.One can expect several blizzards in a normal winter during when roads become completely blocked.
